statements: SELECT * FROM sustainability_data
SELECT location, temperature FROM sustainability_data
SELECT humidity FROM sustainability_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data WHERE carbon_dioxide_level > 500
SELECT location, humidity FROM sustainability_data WHERE temperature < 20
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM sustainability_data
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sustainability_data
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT MAX(temperature) FROM sustainability_data
SELECT MIN(carbon_dioxide_level) FROM sustainability_data
SELECT location FROM sustainability_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT temperature FROM sustainability_data WHERE location = 'London'
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data WHERE humidity < 40 AND carbon_dioxide_level > 300
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM sustainability_data
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM sustainability_data WHERE carbon_dioxide_level > 400
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sustainability_data
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data LIMIT 10
SELECT SUM(temperature) FROM sustainability_data
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) FROM sustainability_data
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact;
SELECT id, category FROM environmental_impact;
SELECT id, description FROM environmental_impact;
SELECT category, description FROM environmental_impact;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_actions;
SELECT id, action_name FROM sustainability_actions;
SELECT id, description FROM sustainability_actions;
SELECT action_name, description FROM sustainability_actions;
SELECT category, impact_score FROM environmental_impact;
SELECT action_name, impact_reduction FROM sustainability_actions;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_actions WHERE impact_reduction < 20;
SELECT id, category FROM environmental_impact WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, category FROM environmental_impact WHERE category = 'Energy';
SELECT * FROM sustainability_actions WHERE impact_reduction = (SELECT MAX(impact_reduction) FROM sustainability_actions);
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT impact_reduction, AVG(impact_reduction) FROM sustainability_actions GROUP BY impact_reduction;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM environmental_impact GROUP BY category;
SELECT category, SUM(impact_score) FROM environmental_impact GROUP BY category;
SELECT category, AVG(impact_score) FROM environmental_impact GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact LIMIT 5
SELECT category, carbon_footprint FROM environmental_impact WHERE carbon_footprint > 100
SELECT description FROM environmental_impact WHERE energy_consumption < 50
SELECT * FROM sustainability_goals LIMIT 5
SELECT goal, progress FROM sustainability_goals WHERE progress < 50
SELECT target FROM sustainability_goals WHERE goal LIKE '%renewable%'
SELECT * FROM sustainability_actions LIMIT 5
SELECT action, impact FROM sustainability_actions WHERE effectiveness > 0.8
SELECT effectiveness FROM sustainability_actions WHERE action LIKE '%reduce%'
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact JOIN sustainability_goals ON environmental_impact.id = sustainability_goals.id
SELECT * FROM sustainability_goals JOIN sustainability_actions ON sustainability_goals.id = sustainability_actions.id
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint;
SELECT company_name, emission_level FROM carbon_footprint;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT device_id, consumption, timestamp FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM waste_management;
SELECT company_name, waste_type, weight FROM waste_management;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_products;
SELECT product_name, price, carbon_offset FROM eco_friendly_products;
SELECT company_name, emission_level FROM carbon_footprint WHERE emission_level > 10;
SELECT device_id, consumption, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption < 100;
SELECT company_name, waste_type, weight FROM waste_management WHERE weight > 50;
SELECT product_name, price, carbon_offset FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Inc';
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint ORDER BY emission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact
SELECT id, name, description FROM environmental_impact
SELECT description FROM sustainability_goals
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics
SELECT metric_name, actual_value FROM sustainability_metrics
SELECT * FROM sustainability_progress
SELECT initiative_id, metric_id, progress_value, date_recorded FROM sustainability_progress
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiatives
SELECT initiative_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM sustainability_initiatives
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM sustainability_goals WHERE completion_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE actual_value >= target_value
SELECT metric_name, target_value FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE target_value < 100
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM sustainability_progress WHERE progress_value < 50
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM sustainability_goals ORDER BY completion_date DESC
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics ORDER BY actual_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiatives ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM sustainability_progress ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
